TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeLibExporterNameProvider

Docs.summary: Provides control over the casing of names when exported to a type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In order to control how types are named when exported to a type library, an object must implement this interface, as well as <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ITypeLibExporterNotifySink>. You then pass this object as the last parameter to <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibConverter.ConvertAssemblyToTypeLib%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string[] GetNames() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a list of names to control the casing of.
Docs.returns: An array of strings, where each element contains the name of a type to control casing for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Names in the array returned from this method must be unique. If a name appears twice in the array of names, even with different casing, the first occurance takes precedence.
